Re: {{'$store.api.Demographics.MpiDemogs[0].PAT_NAME_FIRST' | store}} {{'$store.api.Demographics.MpiDemogs[0].PAT_NAME_LAST' | store}} {{'$store.api.Demographics.MpiDemogs[0].BIRTHDATE' | store}} {{'$store.api.Demographics.MpiDemogs[0].PAT_ADDR1' | store}}
{{'$store.api.Demographics.MpiDemogs[0].PAT_ADDR2' | store}} {{'$store.api.Demographics.MpiDemogs[0].PAT_CITY' | store}} {{'$store.api.Demographics.MpiDemogs[0].PAT_ZIP' | store}}. Tel: {{'$store.api.Demographics.MpiDemogs[0].PHONE_NBR' | store}}

{{'$store.api.Demographics.MpiDemogs[0].NewTitle' | store}} {{'$store.api.Demographics.MpiDemogs[0].PAT_NAME_LAST' | store}} has been seen by the Heart Failure Team during {{'$store.api.Demographics.MpiDemogs[0].hishers' | store}} stay as an inpatient at Walsall Manor Hospital. {{'$store.api.Demographics.MpiDemogs[0].hesheCaps' | store}} was admitted on{{'$store.pages.HFInPatSummary.dtSumAdmitDate.time' | store}} and discharged on {{'$store.pages.HFInPatSummary.dtDischarge.time' | store}}. {{'$store.api.Demographics.MpiDemogs[0].hesheCaps' | store}} was admitted with {{'$store.pages.HFInPatSummary.selSumReasAdm.label' | store}}.

{{'$store.api.Demographics.MpiDemogs[0].hesheCaps' | store}} hasa {{'$store.pages.HFInPatSummary.selSumCHFDiag.label' | store}} diagnosis of heart failure

During {{'$store.api.Demographics.MpiDemogs[0].hisher' | store}} stay {{'$store.api.Demographics.MpiDemogs[0].heshe' | store}} received health education in the following areas:

{{'$store.variables.newChkEdu' | store}}

{{'$store.api.Demographics.MpiDemogs[0].hesheCaps' | store}} has also been referred to the following:

{{'$store.pages.HFInPatEducation.selDiabetic.value' | store}}   {{'$store.pages.HFInPatEducation.selDiet.value' | store}}   {{'$store.pages.HFInPatEducation.selDistrict.value' | store}}   {{'$store.pages.HFInPatEducation.selEmployment.value' | store}}   {{'$store.pages.HFInPatEducation.selHeart.value' | store}}   {{'$store.pages.HFInPatEducation.selOccupational.value' | store}}   {{'$store.pages.HFInPatEducation.selPalliative.value' | store}}   {{'$store.pages.HFInPatEducation.selPhysio.value' | store}}   {{'$store.pages.HFInPatEducation.selPysch.value' | store}}   {{'$store.pages.HFInPatEducation.selPyschology.value' | store}}   {{'$store.pages.HFInPatEducation.selSmoking.value' | store}}   {{'$store.pages.HFInPatEducation.selSocial.value' | store}}   {{'$store.variables.newChkCon' | store}}

The echo result showed: LV Systolic Dysfuntion - {{'$store.pages.HFInPatEcho.radLV' | store}}Severity -{{'$store.pages.HFInPatEcho.radSeverity' | store}}Category - {{'$store.pages.HFInPatEcho.radCategory' | store}}
Echo Report -{{'$store.pages.HFInPatEcho.txtComments' | store}}

Discharge medication is as EDS:


Latest electrolytes and urea dated {{'$store.pages.HFInPatBloodResults.dtNaResult.time' | store}} are:

  • Sodium -{{'$store.pages.HFInPatBloodResults.numNaResult' | store}}
  • Potassium -{{'$store.pages.HFInPatBloodResults.numKResult' | store}}
  • Urea -{{'$store.pages.HFInPatBloodResults.numUrea' | store}}
  • Creatinine -{{'$store.pages.HFInPatBloodResults.numCreatinine' | store}}
Please avoid prescribing NSAIDs and negative inotrope drugs for this patient. Also please ensure they receive an annual influenza jab and are given the pneumococcus jab. All patients on Ace inhibitors, A2 blockers, Spironolactone or diuretics must have their biochemistry checked at least every six months and more frequently if this is unstable.

Please contact the Heart Failure Team if there are any problems.

Yours sincerely




Heart Failure Nurse Specialist

Please ensure this patient is added to your LVSD Register (codes G58 and G5yy9)
